showerReviews.reviewText: An amazing first for me had such an amazing time I never knew you could reserve football fields they also have a public shower program her for 12 a month you can come shower m-f

As of March 2025, it's $4 for a shower.

For someone who is short on money but really wanted to clean up, this was very much appreciated. Thank you for providing an affordable and much needed service!

They have been told many times that the women's locker rooms ONLY have cold showers. The only HOT shower is the family/disabled restroom up front. I went for a shower and even though it was the middle of December; and yet still hadn't taken ‚Ä¶

Had my son's baby shower 2 years ago here at the recreation center and it was great recently visited on a delivery and that was also great customer service area is very friendly and nice and the place is always clean way2go Kiwanis ‚Ä¶
